snippet: A dispute in England over a Banksy work found near a boys club is resolved after a letter from the artist supporting the club’s plan to auction it.
abstract: A dispute in England over a Banksy work found near a boys club is resolved after a letter from the artist supporting the club’s plan to auction it.

headline.main: Banksy Emerges From Shadows to Weigh In on Dispute Over Work
headline.print_headline: Banksy Comments On Dispute Over Work
